constituent: tighten, thread, spiderman, sovereign, vase, stand up, apron, crown, towel
koohiiStory1: The sovereign appears to be ruling, but in reality someone behind him (for instance his wife) has a thread around his throat, and if he dares to make a decision she doesn´t like, she starts pulling the thread and tightens it around his throat.
koohiiStory2: (astridtops) Spiderman managed to get behind the sovereign. (pick your favourite nowadays country ruler who isn´t doing a good job). Spidey has tightend a web around the sovereing´s throat. As long as the sovereign says what spidey whispers, he will be fine. Sovereign yelping : ´ we will draw are troops back! and we will spend more money on healthcare, schools and less on wars!´ Spidey whispering: ´ If you continue at this pace, you might be doing good things AND the people will like you.´.
kunYomi: し.まる、し.まり、し.める、-し.め、-じ.め
readingExamples: 締まる (し.まる), 締める (し.める)
words: closing, cut-off, end, deadline, Closed, No Entrance
to manage, to control, to supervise
closing, cut-off, end, deadline, Closed, No Entrance
